short_description: 8-Outlet Surge Protector: The Geeni smart power strips with surge protection provide 8 outlets, including 6 smart outlets that can be controlled individually via the Geeni app and 2 always-on outlets to supply continuous power to essential devices.

name: Smart Strip ECG-7MVR Energy Saving Surge Protector with Autoswitching Technology, 7 Outlet
short_description: 7 OUTLETS TOTAL—1 Control outlet, 2 Always On outlets and 4 Switched outlets.

product_description: The ECG-7MVR energy saving surge protector operates on a simple master/switched basis. If the TV or PC is on, then peripheral devices are powered on. If the TV or PC is switched off, then the peripheral devices are automatically switched off, thereby reducing power waste.
